reg_pit.title: Property Transfer Tax Exemption Regulation No. 14

change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 68/2017, effective March 1, 2017.

reg:regulation.reg:title: Property Transfer Tax Exemption Regulation No. 14

bcl:section.bcl:text: Transfer to Scia'new Nation Investment Corporation, Inc. No. BC0962456, of the property described below is exempt from tax payable under the Property Transfer Tax Act:

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: Lot 1, Section 121, Sooke District, Plan EPP22373, PID 029-060-109.

bcl:section.bcl:text: This regulation is retroactive to July 30, 2013, with effect on and after that date.

reg:content.reg:provisionsnote: [Provisions relevant to the enactment of this regulation: Property Transfer Tax Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 378, section 37]
